document.full_text: qatar will boost its government budget for the new fiscal year 2011/12 but has no immediate plans to issue sovereign bonds, the gulf arab state's finance minister said on wednesday.
document.title: qatar to boost 2011/12 spending, no bond plans-fin min
lines_and_colors: qatar will boost its government budget for the new fiscal year 2011/12 but has no immediate plans to issue sovereign bonds, the gulf arab state's finance minister said on wednesday.
